intro: Tradescantia schiedeana, commonly known as the "Purple Heart" plant, is a flowering plant native to Central and South America. It belongs to the Commelinaceae family and is characterized by its striking, deep purple to red foliage. The plant produces small, inconspicuous white or green flowers that are typically clustered in dense inflorescences. It thrives in well-drained soil and prefers bright, indirect light. Due to its ornamental value and ease of care, it is a popular choice for indoor gardening.
